name: wid3_F2F2_module8
label: F2F 2: children under 10 (CAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: academic self concept: anticipated self-perceived ability; academic self concept: general self-perceived ability; academic self concept: self-perceived ability in math and German; anticipated intrinsic motivation; anticipated learning motivation; deviant behavior young children (e.g. lying/cheating, fighting with other children); frequency of arguments with partner, frequency of arguments of parents, subjective burden and coping; interviewer rating on task orientation and oral skills following intelligence test; intrinsic motivation for math and German; intrinsic motivation for school in general; learning motivation for school in general; locus of control; quality of familial environment (existence of bedtime routine, general atmosphere at home); stress regulation and coping; twin-specific questions for twins themselves (e.g. relationship to other twin); type of education / training; current status of education / qualification; verbal and physical bullying experience in childhood and adolescence.

spa0100.question: spa0100

spa0200.question: spa0200
spa0200.name: spa0200
spa0200.label: I am . . . in school.
spa0200.label_de: Ich bin fuer die Schule . . . Antworte bitte anhand der folgenden Skala. Der Wert 1 bedeutet: nicht begabt. Der Wert 5 bedeutet: sehr begabt. Mit den Werten zwischen 1 und 5 kannst Du mir sagen, wenn deine Meinung irgendwo dazwischen liegt.

hoe0110.question: hoe0110
hoe0110.name: hoe0110
hoe0110.label: In the following I would like to talk to you about your home. Please indicate how these sentences apply to your home. Please answer using the following scale. The value 1 means: not true at all. This would be a 'thumbs down'. A value of 5 means: exactly right. That would be the 'thumbs up'. With the values between 1 and 5 you can tell me again if your opinion is somewhere in between.
hoe0110.label_de: Im Folgenden moechte ich gerne mit dir ueber Dein Zuhause sprechen. Bitte gib an, inwiefern diese Saetze auf Dein Zuhause zutreffen. Antworte bitte anhand der folgenden Skala. Der Wert 1 bedeutet: stimmt ueberhaupt nicht. Das waere dann der 'Daumen runter'. Der Wert 5 bedeutet: stimmt genau. Das waere dann der 'Daumen hoch'. Mit den Werten zwischen 1 und 5 kannst Du mir wieder sagen, wenn deine Meinung irgendwo dazwischen liegt.

items.text: We have the same bedtime routine every night (e.g. going to bed at the same time every evening, having a bath before going to bed, reading a story, saying our prayers . . .).
